content: Pre-authorization request submitted for comprehensive genetic testing (BRCA1/BRCA2 panel) at Windrose Genomics for patient HK72093. Patient presented with documented strong family history of breast and ovarian cancers across three generations. Initial claim paperwork submitted through Blue Monarch Insurance's specialty diagnostics portal on 02/15/2024, with preoperative genetics team contacting provider for additional testing justification documents. Patient enrolled in Emerging Diagnostic Technologies pilot program with 80% coverage.
